title: Are people in finance untrustworthy? - Moneycontrol
content: Are people in finance untrustworthy?  Moneycontrol
description: Former Goldman Sachs banker Tim Leissner has been confessing up to an awful lot of dishonest behaviour. Is he an outlier or was his boundary-pushing and lack of trustworthiness just on the extreme end of a financial-industry continuum that includes a lot of other dodgy behaviour?
